title: New Backdrop Site
name: new_backdrop_site
description: This is a tour configured for a fresh installation of Backdrop CMS.

text.value:
Welcome to this tour of your new Backdrop CMS site.

We will start here on the front page and show you some of the most important things you need to know about your site.

This admin bar at the top of the page is for administrators only.

You can navigate to almost every administrative tool on your site through the menus provided here.

Admin_Menu_Search.title: Admin Menu Search
Admin_Menu_Search.text: This menu search will help you find features and configuration pages quickly.

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.text: Here is a quick link to the Dashboard.

Welcome_Block.title: Welcome Block - Dashboard
Welcome_Block.text:
The Dashboard is a great place to get started.

You will find lots of useful information about your site and tips for beginners in our welcome block.

Content_Menu.title: Content Menu
Content_Menu.text: This is where you will manage the content on your site.

Content_List.title: Content List
Content_List.text: The content page has a list of all the content on your site.

Content_Filters.title: Content Filters
Content_Filters.text: Search your content by title or filter by content type.

User_Accounts.title: User Accounts
User_Accounts.text: This is where you will add, delete, and manage your user accounts.

Manage_Users.title: Manage Users
Manage_Users.text: Here you can search for users by name or filter by status or role.

Appearance.title: Appearance
Appearance.text: This is the page where you can administer and add new themes to your site to change the overall look and feel.

Install_Themes.title: Find new themes
Install_Themes.text: You can browse and install new themes available on BackdropCMS.org.

Functionality.title: Functionality
Functionality.text: This is where you can download and adminster modules that add functionality to your site.

Find_New_Modules.title: Find New Modules
Find_New_Modules.text: Click here to search for and find new modules that add functionality to your site.

Structure.title: Structure
Structure.text: Use the structure menu to create new content types, configure your site layout, edit your menus and add taxonomy terms.

Layouts.title: How layouts work
Layouts.text:
Every page on your site is governed by a layout.

This section will help you understand a little better how to determine which layout is used for which page.

Dashboard_Layout.title: Dashboard Layout.
Dashboard_Layout.text:
The Dashboard has it's own custom layout.

You can add custom blocks here or disable blocks on the Dashboard that you don't need or use.

Default_Layout.title: Default Layout.
Default_Layout.text: Default layout is used for any page without a custom layout of it's own.

This_Page.title: Find the layout for your page.
This_Page.text: You can always jump to the layout or theme for any page using the 'This page' component in the admin bar menu.

Home_Page_Layout.title: Home Page Layout
Home_Page_Layout.text:
Most sites have a custom layout for the home page.

We are looking at the 'Top' region. Use the 'Add Block' option to add existing blocks or create new ones, use the 'Configure' option to edit/configure existing blocks.

Select_Layout_Template.title: Select A Layout Template
Select_Layout_Template.text: For each layout on your site, you can choose from a number of existing layout templates and configure your layout visibility rules.

Layout_Templates.title: Layout Templates
Layout_Templates.text: Go to Layouts > Templates to manage which templates are available.

Flexible_Templates_Page.title: Flexible Layout Templates
Flexible_Templates_Page.text: Build your own layout template with precisely the regions and configuration that you require.

End_of_Tour.title: End of Tour
End_of_Tour.text:
We can't cover everything in just one tour.

Please, checkout the Backdrop User Guide for more information.
